text: walaqad 'arsalna musaa bhjjna 'iilaa fireawn washraf qwmh, kama 'arsalnak -ayha alrswl- 'iilaa hwla' almushrikin min qwmk, faqal lahum mwsa: 'iiniy rasul rabi alealmyn, falamaa ja'ahum bialbayinat alwadhat aldalt ealaa sdqh fi dewth, 'iidha fireawn wmlwh mimaa ja'ahum bih musaa min alayat walebr ydhkwn
